effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Shield Wall for 4.0 sec and gain Luck of the Draw!, which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 12 sec.
Set: During Luck of the Draw! Shield Slam's chance to critically strike is increased by 75% and its critical strikes reduce the cooldown of Shield Charge by 12.0 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Advance to the 50 Verses of Inner Resilience, reading as you are attacked.
Inner Resilience increases your armor by 3,311 and grants your attacks a chance to invoke a ward which absorbs 839,107 Magic damage. When finished, sift through the passages to another chapter.
Use: Sift through the passages in the tome with increased Radiance. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Taking damage has a chance to erupt the ground, covering you in a layer of dark oil that absorbs 459,155 damage for 15 sec. When the shield is broken, it splatters nearby enemies for 110,247 Shadow damage.
Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.
